name: Return
note: All Pok√©mon who can learn TMs can learn Return except Unown, Wobbuffet, Wynaut, Kricketot, Burmy, Tynamo, and Spewpa.
summary: Deals damage depending on the friendship of the Pokemon. The higher the friendship, the higher the Pokemon (denoted by the formula Base Power = Friendship / 2.5). It has a maximum power of 102.
viability: Return is the most common Normal-type move due to its power and high distribution. In-game, happiness will increase as you go throughout the game so its power will naturally be better than Frustration.
